metadata.title: CVE-2024-48949 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The verify function in lib/elliptic/eddsa/index.js in the Elliptic packagebefore 6.5.6 for Node.js omits "sig.S().gte(sig.eddsa.curve.n) ||sig.S().isNeg()" validation.

criterions.comment: node-elliptic package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
